sentences.en: Is there really a way to categorize different types of students?
sentences.cn: 真的有把不同类型的学生进行分类的办法吗？

sentences.en: Lindsay, like his films, is hard to categorize.
sentences.cn: 就像他演的电影难于归类一样，很难说林赛属于哪一类演员。

sentences.en: There was not much agreement about how to identify or categorize earlier eras.
sentences.cn: 关于如何鉴别或归类早期的时代，人们没有达成多少共识。
